analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x2b7e29c4dcada4ddbb85b741f1ef8807efdd3e43.sol:
	Contract Megaton has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x2b7e29c4dcada4ddbb85b741f1ef8807efdd3e43.sol#174-177)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x2b7e29c4dcada4ddbb85b741f1ef8807efdd3e43.sol:
